entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Http3 in scenarios where ipv6 has been disabled at the runtime level #113100
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters compatibility package question #113099
  • `statfs`/`statvfs` calls in native impl. for `[System.IO.DriveInfo]::GetDrives()` hangs when run against a disconnected network mountpoint #113098
  • InvariantGlobalization does not behave as documented #113097
  • Proposal: Enhance ToDictionary with Duplicate Key Handling Options #113096
  • [API Proposal]: Add AVX10.2 MoveScalar APIs: VMOVD / VMOVW #113090
  • Mac OSX - Timer runs early and causes Elapsed Handler to execute twice. #113089
  • Use PGO for Optimize Bools and If Conversion #113080
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement GetAuthorizationGroups fails with "Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212)" #113079
  • error CS1056: Unexpected character '−' with Regex on Mac #113077
  • [Mono AOT] Skip compiling methods from the `METHODSPEC` table that are trimmed away #113076
    10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Emit dedup generic types directly into source assemblies #113075
    10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Improve `dn_simdhash` lookup on arm64 #113074
    10.0.0
  • [Android][Apple] Setup build-time performance measurements for mobile platforms in the perf lab #113073
    10.0.0
  • Arm64: Use carry instructions for 128bit arithmetic #113070
  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Operations Per Dimension #113068
    10.0.0
  • create host to run on wasm/browser #113067
  • build coreclr parts required for the interpreter #113065
  • run paltests on helix #113064
  • paltests build on CI #113063
    10.0.0
  • [tvOS] XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest fails #113062
  • Undocumented ArgumentOutOfRangeException in XmlReader created from MemoryStream #113061
  • [Mono] Runtime test "test76531" fails in the LLVM (and mini) Full AOT configuration on linux-x64 #113060
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #113059
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a NormalizeEntrySeparator(Char, Char) method for ZipFileExtension. #113058
  • JIT: Redundant bounds check depending on branch order #113054
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/TypeInitialization/CircularCctors/CircularCctorThreeThreads03/CircularCctorThreeThreads03.cmd #113053
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #113052
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/Cmn/Cmn.cmd #113051
  • Test failure: Interop/StructMarshalling/PInvoke/MarshalStructAsLayoutExp/MarshalStructAsLayoutExp.cmd #113050
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.XmlDsigExcC14NTransformTest.ExcC14NSpecExample5 #113049

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding a Clone() Method to the hash implementations #111908
    Future
  • TensorPrimitives asymmetry between MultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate with trivial inputs #112989
  • Question: do I need to dispose the X509Certificate2 elements in an X509Chain myself? #112987
    10.0.0
  • System.Linq.Expressions may prevent assembly unloading when using MethodInfo objects from non-collectible type with collectible generic arguments #112518
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/basic/refloc_i4_r/refloc_i4_r.cmd #112619
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.cmd #112546
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_71611/Runtime_71611/Runtime_71611.cmd #112332
    10.0.0
  • Remove `Verify` macros in `importer.cpp` #64399
    Future
  • Review the multi-op instruction usage for Arm64 #68028
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.StackTrace build emits several "Could not resolve reference" messages #113083
  • make simple-server open url with chromedriver #113066
  • Linker error in InputNumber #111160
  • Why my ETW provider is not showing up in logman? #112768
    10.0.0
  • System.Globalization Area Performance Tests #21274
  • `wasm` not support the FrameworkReference of `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App` #110036
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: stop using ehTrueEnclosingTryIndexIL outside of importation #113102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't break up loop bodies during hot jump compaction #113101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better ARM intrinsics implementation for dn_simdhash #113095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113094
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Mark certain intrinsics as non-escaping #113093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ARM NEON path in dn_simdhash due to performance issues #113092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Document exceptions in OrderedDictionary #113091
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add API compat instructions to libraries building README #113088
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [infra] Add runtime-llvm to build analysis #113086
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Apple mobile] Set `DataSetXmlSerializationSupport` to `true` in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #113084
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use invariant culture when formatting capture transfer in regex source generator #113081
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove unnecessary `GcInfoEncoder::DoNotTrackInPartiallyInterruptible` #113078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix icon and vn mismatch in an assertion #113072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify internal GC tracking structures #113071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Assert pointer relocs are aligned #113069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Template EH-specific checks in 3-opt layout #111437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm Clone methods #113087
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113047
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add approved TensorPrimitives surface area #112933
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add test for external assembly probe mechanism #113007
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [android] Make Android app on coreclr use host-runtime contract and provide external assembly probe #112938
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not cache method parameters for collectible methods #113085
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consolidate layout passes into one phase #112004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.15
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.4
  • [wasm] Stop hardcoding TFM in Wasm.Build.Tests #112955
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 133.0.6943.141, windows: 134.0.6998.35 #113036
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112991
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Publish dotnet/runtime using standard Arcade Publish tooling #111934
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • Experimental PR #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify managed type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Clean up code gen for floating comparisons #111626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] PerfScore #113011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Stackwalking support TransitionFrames and FuncEvalFrames #112997
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113014
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Harden some reflection invoke tests #113000
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Improve zero-sized methods check and missing ret at exit #112082
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Devirtualization and inlining for GVM #112353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Doc fixes for .NET 10 Preview 1 update #113027
    needs-area-label
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use collection expressions in array.cs #113028
    needs-area-label
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX #113032
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #111666
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.15
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refactor around impDevirtualizeCall for GVM devirt #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [SGen/Tarjan] Handle edge case with node heaviness changing due to deduplication #113044
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `WriteImportMapToHtml` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix detecting [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112981
    area-Interop-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
